item.title: 特朗普贸易协定看似不可能达成，习近平转入战斗模式
item.description: 习近平主席决定迅速报复唐纳德-特朗普的全面关税，向全世界发出了一个明确的信息：如果美国想打贸易战，中国已经做好了战斗准备。【原文：President Xi Jinping’s decision to quickly retaliate against Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs sent the world a clear message: If the US wants a trade war, China is ready to fight.】

item.title: 对冲基金在市场疲软中录得历史性单日股票大跌
item.description: 根据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Hedge funds recorded their largest-ever one-day net sales of global equities on the first day of trading after President Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs announcement, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s prime brokerage desk.】

item.title: 英国为苹果加密战保密的努力在法庭上受阻
item.description: 一家法院阻止了英国政府对其要求获取苹果公司用户数据的法律案件保密的企图，这是隐私权倡导者的一次胜利。【原文：A court has blocked a British government attempt to keep secret a legal case over its demand to access Apple Inc. user data in a victory for privacy advocates.】

item.title: 诺和诺德银行称正继续为可能的首次公开募股做准备
item.description: 由 Lone Star 持有多数股权的葡萄牙贷款公司 Novo Banco SA 表示，该公司正在继续为可能的首次公开募股做准备，但尚未确定出售的确切时间。【原文：Novo Banco SA, a Portuguese lender that’s majority-owned by Lone Star, said it’s continuing to prepare for a possible initial public offering, with no exact timing set yet for a sale.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯全球销量下滑，中国订单减少 10
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰集团（Mercedes-Benz Group AG）在其最大的市场中国正进一步落后，激烈的竞争和持续的价格战正在挤压欧洲汽车制造商。【原文：Mercedes-Benz Group AG is falling further behind in China, its largest market, where fierce competition and an ongoing price war are squeezing European carmakers.】

item.title: 泰国官员称不会急于降低美国进口税
item.description: 一位政府顾问表示，泰国为尽量减少美国关税带来的冲击而采取的策略将包括承诺进口更多商品和增加美国投资，而不是直接提出削减进口税。【原文：Thailand’s strategy to minimize the hit from US tariffs will include pledges to import more goods and ramping up of US investments, and not any outright offer to cut import taxes, according to a government adviser.】

item.title: 特朗普关税冲击市场，亚洲首富损失 460 亿美元
item.description: 受美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布加征关税的影响，周一亚洲市场继续下跌，亚洲首富的财富也随之暴跌。【原文：The fortunes of Asia’s richest plunged on Monday as markets across the region continued to fall in the wake of President Donald Trump’s tariff announcements.】

item.title: 关税增加政治和财政风险，罗马尼亚维持利率不变
item.description: 全球贸易紧张局势升级加剧了国内政治和预算风险，在总统选举重选前一个月，罗马尼亚央行第五次会议维持利率不变。【原文：Romania’s central bank kept interest rates unchanged for a fifth meeting as escalating global trade tensions compounded domestic political and budget risks one month before a presidential election re-run.】

item.title: 德国哈贝克称，马斯克正表现出虚弱和恐惧的迹象
item.description: 即将卸任的德国副总理罗伯特-哈贝克（Robert Habeck）说，埃隆-马斯克支持跨大西洋零关税贸易体系的言论表明了这位亿万富翁的软弱和恐惧。【原文：Elon Musk’s comments in support of a zero-tariff transatlantic trade system are a sign of the billionaire’s weakness and fear, Germany’s outgoing Vice Chancellor Robert Habeck said.】

item.title: 经济衰退风险加剧，摩根士丹利下调银行业评级
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）分析师下调了对大中型银行的看法，理由是唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税政策增加了经济衰退的风险，并有可能延长资本市场活动实质性复苏的时间。【原文：Analysts at Morgan Stanley cut their view on large- and midcap banks on the rationale that President Donald Trump’s tariff policy increases the risk of recession and threatens to prolong any material resurgence in capital markets activity.】

item.title: 中国可以帮助中国抵御特朗普关税大潮的影响
item.description:
周五的报复行动表明，中国政府将使出浑身解数来维持世界第二大经济体的建设和消费。【原文：

Friday’s retaliation indicates that Beijing will pull every lever to keep the world’s No. 2 economy building and consuming.

】

item.title: 据说 Ardian 将在团队重组期间推迟收购筹款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，欧洲最大的投资公司之一 Ardian 已推迟了其数十亿旗舰基金的筹资计划，因为在私募股权投资市场日益艰难的情况下，该公司正在重组其收购团队。【原文：Ardian, one of Europe’s largest investment firms, has delayed the planned fundraising for its multi-billion flagship fund as it’s restructuring its buyout team in an increasingly difficult market for private equity, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 卢森堡的贝泰尔表示，欧盟可以联合起来找到美国的贸易妥协方案
item.description: 卢森堡副首相泽维尔-贝泰尔（Xavier Bettel）表示，只要所有成员国团结一致，欧洲就能在与美国的贸易冲突中找到解决方案。【原文：Europe can find a solution in the trade conflict with the US as long as all member states stick together, according to Luxembourg Deputy Prime Minister Xavier Bettel.】

item.title: 帕克兰顶尖持有人加大斗争力度，寻求首席执行官下台和董事会重组
item.description: 辛普森石油有限公司（Simpson Oil Ltd.）已开始争夺帕克兰公司（Parkland Corp. ）的控制权，包括彻底改革这家连锁加油站的董事会，并将长期任职的首席执行官鲍勃-埃斯佩（Bob Espey）赶下台，旨在解决这家投资公司所谓的 "长期业绩不佳 "问题。【原文：Simpson Oil Ltd. has launched a fight for control at Parkland Corp., which includes overhauling the gas station chain’s board and ousting long-serving Chief Executive Officer Bob Espey, aiming to fix what the investment firm calls a “chronic underperformance.”】

item.title: 荷兰银行冻结招聘以帮助实现成本目标
item.description: 荷兰银行（ABN Amro Bank NV）已暂停招聘，以努力实现全年支出目标。【原文：ABN Amro Bank NV has suspended hiring in an effort to meet its full-year expense target.】

item.title: 英国央行行长贝利被提名领导全球金融监管局 FSB
item.description: 英格兰银行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）获得一致支持，提名他在现任主席克拉斯-克诺（Klaas Knot）离职后领导金融稳定委员会。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey won unanimous backing for his nomination to lead the Financial Stability Board after incumbent Chair Klaas Knot leaves.】

item.title: 津巴布韦支持 ZiG 货币的储备金增至 6.29 亿美元
item.description: 津巴布韦央行行长约翰-穆沙亚万胡说，自一年前推出与金银挂钩的单位以来，支持该单位的黄金和外汇储备增长了两倍多。【原文：Gold and foreign currency reserves backing Zimbabwe’s bullion-linked unit have risen more than twofold since its introduction a year ago, central bank Governor John Mushayavanhu said.】

item.title: 关税甚至拖累了没有美国出口的公司
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社遍布全球的记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，弗拉德-萨沃夫（Vlad Savov）将对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）关于对美国进口产品征收全球关税的最新言论引发的亚洲股市大跌进行反思。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. item.title: 市场低迷，中美痛苦阈值面临考验
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特（Malcolm Scott），驻悉尼的国际经济企业编辑。今天，我们将关注唐纳德-特朗普的关税措施所带来的市场和经济影响将如何考验华盛顿和北京领导人的痛苦阈值。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics enterprise editor in Sydney. Today we’re looking at how market and economic fallout from Donald Trump’s tariffs will test the pain threshold of leaders in Washington and Beijing. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 特朗普的紧急关税从 "解放 "到诉讼
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）及其高级经济顾问周日发出了一系列明确的信号，表示即使在金融市场大肆屠杀的情况下，他们也不打算放弃关税计划。【原文：US President Donald Trump and his top economic advisers sent a series of clear signals Sunday that they have no plans to abandon his tariff plans even as the carnage in financial markets piles up.】

item.title: 风险投资公司 SignalFire 融资 10 亿美元，将让人工智能帮助挑选投资项目
item.description:
有了新资金，SignalFire 将专注于人工智能—，并加以利用。【原文：

With the new funds SignalFire will focus on AI — and use it too. 

】

item.title: 13 张图表揭示关税对整个金融市场的影响
item.description: 由于投资者担心唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战将打击企业盈利并引发潜在的全球经济衰退，全球金融市场摇摇欲坠。【原文：Financial markets are faltering around the world as investors worry President Donald Trump’s trade war will hammer corporate earnings and trigger a potential global recession.】

item.title: 印度提高燃油税，同时保持泵价稳定
item.description: 印度从周二开始将柴油和汽油税每升提高 2 卢比，这一举措将有助于在全球原油价格下跌的情况下增加印度的财政收入。【原文：India increased taxes on diesel and gasoline by 2 rupees a liter beginning Tuesday, a step that will help boost its revenue amid falling global crude oil prices.】

item.title: 本田高管被指行为不当后辞职
item.description: 本田汽车公司的一位最高级管理人员辞职，因为该汽车制造商的董事会调查了他在工作时间以外的一次社交聚会上有不当行为的指控。【原文：One of Honda Motor Co.’s senior-most executives resigned after the automaker’s board investigated allegations he’d engaged in inappropriate conduct during a social gathering outside of work hours.】

item.title: 德国呼吁采取最强硬手段报复美国关税
item.description: 德国希望欧盟考虑使用其最强大的工具来报复美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战。【原文：Germany wants the European Union to consider using its most powerful tool to retaliate against the US President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.description:

item.title: 关税战引发香港股市自 1997 年以来最严重的暴跌
item.description: 对于香港的股票交易者来说，周一的混乱是史无前例的。【原文：For stock traders in Hong Kong, Monday’s mayhem was one for the history books.】

item.title: 特朗普关税激怒市场，埃及英镑跌至新低
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税激怒全球市场后，埃及货币创下自去年贬值以来的最大跌幅，创下历史新低。【原文：Egypt’s currency plunged the most since last year’s devaluation to hit a record low after US President Donald Trump’s tariffs roiled global markets.】

item.title: 杰米-戴蒙表示应尽快解决关税政策问题
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）敦促尽快解决美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策所引发的不确定性，并警告说，美国的长期经济联盟可能会出现 "灾难性 "的分裂。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon urged a quick resolution to the uncertainties sparked by President Donald Trump’s tariffs and warned against a potentially “disastrous” fragmentation of America’s long-term economic alliances.】

item.title: 科技股处于 "风暴眼"，交易员为更大损失做好准备
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普坚称不会在上周发起的关税大潮中退缩，市场专业人士正在为受关税影响最大的公司进行最坏情况的预测。他们的预期是严峻的。【原文：With President Donald Trump insisting he won’t back down from the barrage of tariffs unleashed last week, market professionals are gaming out worst-case scenarios for the companies most exposed to the levies. What they’re expecting is grim.】
